description: He only piloted the Pteras (pronounced "terrace") in the first half of the season, because Doc, our impulse shopper, traded it off on a Raynos after the Pteras was rendered unpilotable by the Backdraft`s Zabat. When he was piloting the Reynos, he entered a subconscious state and actually started being a man, instead of a kid. He`s learning to grow, but he isn`t there yet.
name: Jamie Hemeros
